tables.name: users
tables.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users(id INT PRIMARY KEY ASC,email TEXT NOT NULL,password TEXT NOT NULL,verified BOOLEAN);

tables.name: uploads
tables.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS uploads(id INT PRIMARY KEY ASC,userId INT ASC,fileName TEXT NOT NULL,uploadId TEXT NOT NULL,mimeType TEXT NOT NULL,password TEXT);

tables.name: migrations
tables.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migrations(id INT PRIMARY KEY ASC,version INT)

tables.name: libraries
tables.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS libraries(id INT PRIMARY KEY ASC,userId INT ASC,name TEXT NOT NULL,privateId TEXT NOT NULL); ALTER TABLE uploads ADD COLUMN libraryId INT;
